ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: I found it quite amusing last night while i was in Rathe Mts. we were hunting Hill giants and there was a Druid who was a blue con to me, so he was under lvl
ygData.messageBody:
I found it quite amusing last night while i was in Rathe Mts. we were
hunting Hill giants and there was a Druid who was a blue con to me, so he
was under lvl 35 and he was kiting hill giants that were yellow to me so
chances are it was red to him. amazing what kiting can do

Bree Wyndsdale
-----Original Message-----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 10, 1999 4:33 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire


>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>not true...druids can solo yellows...and reds sometimes...if they have the
>mana to....kiting is interesting...messed with it tonight....would've
killed
>a yellow solo, but didn't have the mana for it...gotta do some twinking and
>find some spare wis items hehehe (;
>
>(\/)ystix Spellchaser
>lv 40 human <blind as a bat> cleric of The Rathe
>
>kurt walther wrote:
>
>> From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>>
>> Paladins suck at higher lvls.. cleric's don't. We don't need the damn
>> sword when we have our undead spells. No other class can truely solo
>> yellows. And.. who says there isn't a mace or hammer for us clerics.
>> =)
